mapper.select: SELECT SCHDL_ID schdlId, SCHDL_NAME schdlName, ADDRESS_GRP_ID addressGrpId, SENDER sender, FILE_PATH filePath, SEND_GUBUN sendGubun, SEND_TYPE sendType, SEND_FLAG sendFlag, REG_DATE regDate FROM GS_SEND_SCHDL WHERE SEND_GUBUN = 'M' AND SEND_TYPE LIKE 'C%' AND SEND_FLAG = '20' AND RESERVE_DATE < SYSDATE()
